text: Bleckmar is a village administered by the Lower Saxon town of Bergen in the northern part of Celle on the Lüneburg Heath in North Germany. It is about north of Bergen on the B 3 federal road. It is administratively responsible for the neighbouring hamlet of Dageförde. == References == == Literature == *Alfred Keseberg u. a.: Festschrift der Gemeinde Bleckmar zu ihrer 1.100-Jahr- Feier Bleckmar 1966 *Markus Nietzke: Ein Missionshaus in Bleckmar!? Heimatkalender. Jahrbuch für die Lüneburger Heide 2007. == Other websites == * The official Bleckmar home page * Information about Bleckmar * Official home page of the Lutheran Church Mission - Bleckmarer Mission e. title: Bleckmar
